thread.title: MOCA Cleveland director calls Trump Administration's immigration ban "an affront to our values"
thread.title_full: MOCA Cleveland director calls Trump Administration's immigration ban "an affront to our values"

author: Steven Litt, The Plain Dealer
title: MOCA Cleveland director calls Trump Administration's immigration ban "an affront to our values"
text: Jill Snyder, director of the Museum of Contemporary Art Cleveland, called the Trump Administration's ban on travel and immigration from seven majority Muslim nations "an affront to our values."
